author: Alan Tonelson
title: Just How Dependent is America on Foreign Medical Supplies?
description: The government's own numbers tell a frightening tale of our reliance on the rest of the world. The post Just How Dependent is America on Foreign Medical Supplies? appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: The government's own numbers tell a frightening tale of our reliance on the rest of the world.With the CCP Virus pandemic having exposed scary domestic shortages of critical medical goods ranging from safety masks to ventilators, along with potential shortage… [+7697 chars]
